name: frazzle
content:
frazzle noun [S]
(TIRED STATE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal a state of being very tired in a nervous or slightly anxious (= worried and nervous) way after a lot of mental or physical effort: wear yourself to a frazzle She's worn herself to a frazzle (= made herself very tired and nervous) trying to meet the deadline.

frazzle noun [S]
(BURNED)
UK informal a state of being completely burned or tired out: be burned to a frazzle I went to answer the phone and when I came back the eggs were burned to a frazzle.
